= Version Information =

The build places a version number, and other identifying information, into the META-INF/MANIFEST.MF file of the archive(s) created. The following table identifies the JBoss AS version associated with each JBiA source version.

||*JBiA Source Version*||*JBoss AS Version*||
||1.1||5.0.0.GA and 5.0.1.GA||
||1.0||5.0.0.GA||
||0.9||5.0.0.CR2||
||0.8||5.0.0.CR1||
